author: The Film Theorists
description:
Thank you to Duolingo for sponsoring this video! Download the Duolingo app here: https://app.adjust.com/1m65f902 

*🤫 Subscribe or vanish!* ► https://www.youtube.com/@FilmTheory/?sub_confirmation=1

Wait…Duolingo has LORE?! After many requests from the community, we are FINALLY taking a deep dive into how this language learning app and its owl mascot may not be as innocent as it appears.

title: Film Theory: ﻿Duolingo LORE Exists... And It's Actually Creepy!
